Package org.dnsge.util.tableprinter.table

Class Table

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.dnsge.util.tableprinter.table.Table
  • public class Table
extends java.lang.Object
    Class that represents a table that can be printed. Essentially a bean
    Version:
    2.0

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor Description
      Table​(DataSource dataSource)
      Creates a new Table from a DataSource object

      DataSource getDataSource()
      Returns this Table's DataSource.

      Returns this Table's char that is used as a horizontal separator.

      Returns this Table's char that is used as an intersection character.

      Returns this Table's TableAlignment.

      Sets whether this Table should use a specialized intersection character.
      void setVerticalSeparator​(char verticalSeparator)
      Sets this Table's char that is used as a vertical separator.
      boolean useIntersectionChar()
      Returns whether this Table should use a specialized intersection character (if true), or if the Table should use the regular horizontal separator (if false).

      • useIntersectionChar

        public boolean useIntersectionChar()
        Returns whether this Table should use a specialized intersection character (if true), or if the Table should use the regular horizontal separator (if false).
        Returns:
        Whether this Table should use a specialized intersection character
